# TDD Red Phase - Write Failing Tests First

Write front end tests using Jest and React Testing Library that describe the desired behavior from GitHub issue requirements before any implementation exists.

## Usage

```
/tdd-red
```

## Remarks

- When finished, prompt the user to enter `/tdd-green` to proceed to the next phase.
